{"id":721418206,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1655142420,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/721418206/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"40.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n\n    private int getNext(int n) {\n        int totalSum = 0;\n        while (n > 0) {\n            int d = n % 10;\n            n = n / 10;\n            totalSum += d * d;\n        }\n        return totalSum;\n    }\n\n    public boolean isHappy(int n) {\n        Set<Integer> seen = new HashSet<>();\n        while (n != 1 && !seen.contains(n)) {\n            seen.add(n);\n            n = getNext(n);\n        }\n        return n == 1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false}
